#summary How to compile and run the DL-GRE tool.

= Prerequisites =

 * Apache Ant 1.6.2 or higher
 * Java


= Compiling =

 * Check out the source tree from Google Code
 * Go to the new directory
 * type "ant"

This should produce a file build/lib/DlGre.jar, which you can run with "java -jar" as usual.


= Running =

The program expects the name of an XML domain specification as a command-line parameter. You can run it on the example data as follows:

{{{
java -jar build/lib/DlGre.jar examples/dale-haddock.xml
}}}
